QuestData.Title: The Crucible of Carnage: The Wayward Wildhammer!
QuestData.Description: You're going to love this one! The Wildhammer heard you were entering the arena and they're determined to make sure you don't leave it.$B$BTime for some good ol' $r on dwarf action! Let me know when you're ready to do this!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Ain't no lovin' like troll lovin'.
QuestData.LogDescription: Get in the arena at the Crucible of Carnage and defeat Sully Kneecapper!
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Wodin the Troll-Servant at the Crucible of Carnage in the Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: No love in your heart for dwarves I see. You really made a mess of that guy.
